snippet: A judge ruled Monday that the Encinitas Union School District can teach yoga, rejecting pleas of parents who said the classes were inherently religious.
abstract: San Diego Judge John S Meyer rules that Encinitas Union School District in California can teach yoga, rejecting pleas of parents who say classes are inherently religious.
lead_paragraph: A judge ruled Monday that the Encinitas Union School District can teach yoga, rejecting pleas of parents who said the classes were inherently religious.

headline.main: California: Judge Allows Yoga in Schools
headline.print_headline: California: Judge Allows Yoga In Schools
